mutants.code:
def howManyGames(p, d, m, s):
    i = 1
    cost = p
    while s - cost >= 0:
        i += 1
        s -= cost
        cost = max(cost - d, m)
    return i

    i = -1
    cost = p
    while s - cost >= 0:
        i += 1
        s -= cost
        cost = max(cost - d, m)
    return i
